verses.verse: וְנֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> And when any כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now when תַקְרִ֞יב <S%H7126><s%> will offer קָרְבַּ֤ן <S%H7133><s%> offering מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> a meat לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> shall be [of] fine flour יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <S%H7133><s%> his offering וְיָצַ֤ק <S%H3332><s%> and he shall pour עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and שֶׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> upon it and put עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and לְבֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3828><s%> frankincense

וֶֽהֱבִיאָ֗הּ <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹן֮ <S%H175><s%> it to Aaron's הַכֹּהֲנִים֒ <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְקָמַ֨ץ <S%H7061><s%> and he shall take מִשָּׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> thereout מְלֹ֣א <S%H4393><s%> all along קֻמְצ֗וֹ <S%H7062><s%> handful מִסָּלְתָּהּ֙ <S%H5560><s%> of the flour וּמִשַּׁמְנָ֔הּ <S%H8081><s%> thereof and of the oil עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבֹנָתָ֑הּ <S%H3828><s%> thereof with all the frankincense וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> thereof and the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַזְכָּרָתָהּ֙ <S%H234><s%> the memorial הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> of it upon the altar אִשֵּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> [to be] an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3498><s%> And the remnant מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> of the grain הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> of the meat offering לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> [shall be] Aaron's וּלְבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [it is] a thing most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy מֵאִשֵּׁ֥י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for תַקְרִ֛ב <S%H7126><s%> And if thou bring קָרְבַּ֥ן <S%H7133><s%> an oblation מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> of a meat offering מַאֲפֵ֣ה <S%H3989><s%> baken תַנּ֑וּר <S%H8574><s%> in the oven סֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour חַלּ֤וֹת <S%H2471><s%> cakes מַצֹּת֙ <S%H4682><s%> [it shall be] unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <S%H7550><s%> wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> or unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֥ים <S%H4886><s%> anointed בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> with oil ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מִנְחָ֥ה <S%H4503><s%> [be] a meat offering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַֽמַּחֲבַ֖ת <S%H4227><s%> [baken] in a pan קָרְבָּנֶ֑ךָ <S%H7133><s%> And if thy oblation סֹ֛לֶת <S%H5560><s%> it shall be [of] fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil מַצָּ֥ה <S%H4682><s%> unleavened תִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

פָּת֤וֹת <S%H6626><s%> Thou shalt part אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> פִּתִּ֔ים <S%H6595><s%> it in pieces וְיָצַקְתָּ֥ <S%H3332><s%> and pour עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and שָׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> thereon it [is] a meat offering הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> now if מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> [be] a meat offering מַרְחֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H4802><s%> [baken] in the fryingpan קָרְבָּנֶ֑ךָ <S%H7133><s%> And if thy oblation סֹ֥לֶת <S%H5560><s%> [of] fine flour בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil תֵּעָשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> it shall be made

וְהֵבֵאתָ֣ <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> the meat offering אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which יֵעָשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> that is made מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of these things unto the LORD וְהִקְרִיבָהּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> and when it is presented אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest וְהִגִּישָׁ֖הּ <S%H5066><s%> he shall bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> it unto the altar

וְהֵרִ֨ים <S%H7311><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> from the meat offering אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַזְכָּ֣רָתָ֔הּ <S%H234><s%> a memorial וְהִקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> thereof and shall burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar אִשֵּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> [it is] an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3498><s%> And that which is left מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> of the grain הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> of the meat offering לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> [shall be] Aaron's וּלְבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [it is] a thing most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy מֵאִשֵּׁ֥י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> No meat offering אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּקְרִ֙יבוּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> which ye shall bring לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> shall be made חָמֵ֑ץ <S%H2557><s%> with leaven כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> or כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any שְׂאֹר֙ <S%H7603><s%> no leaven וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דְּבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> nor any honey לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַקְטִ֧ירוּ <S%H6999><s%> for ye shall burn מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> as אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> made by fire לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

קָרְבַּ֥ן <S%H7133><s%> As for the oblation רֵאשִׁ֛ית <S%H7225><s%> of the firstfruits תַּקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> ye shall offer אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> them unto the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <S%H4196><s%> on the altar לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> but they shall not be burnt לְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹֽחַ׃ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every קָרְבַּ֣ן <S%H7133><s%> And every oblation מִנְחָתְךָ֮ <S%H4503><s%> of thy meat offering בַּמֶּ֣לַח <S%H4417><s%> with salt תִּמְלָח֒ <S%H4414><s%> shalt thou season וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַשְׁבִּ֗ית <S%H7673><s%> to be lacking מֶ֚לַח <S%H4417><s%> neither shalt thou suffer the salt בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> of thy God מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and מִנְחָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4503><s%> from thy meat offering עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קָרְבָּנְךָ֖ <S%H7133><s%> with all thine offerings תַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> thou shalt offer מֶֽלַח׃ <S%H4417><s%> salt ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תַּקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> And if thou offer מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> a meat offering בִּכּוּרִ֖ים <S%H1061><s%> of thy firstfruits לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אָבִ֞יב <S%H24><s%> green ears קָל֤וּי <S%H7033><s%> of corn dried בָּאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> by the fire גֶּ֣רֶשׂ <S%H1643><s%> [even] corn beaten כַּרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3759><s%> out of full ears תַּקְרִ֕יב <S%H7126><s%> thou shalt offer אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> for the meat offering בִּכּוּרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1061><s%> of thy firstfruits

וְנָתַתָּ֤ <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and שֶׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> upon it and lay עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and לְבֹנָ֑ה <S%H3828><s%> frankincense מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> thereon it [is] a meat offering הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַזְכָּרָתָ֗הּ <S%H234><s%> the memorial מִגִּרְשָׂהּ֙ <S%H1643><s%> of it [part] of the beaten corn וּמִשַּׁמְנָ֔הּ <S%H8081><s%> thereof and [part] of the oil עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבֹנָתָ֑הּ <S%H3828><s%> thereof with all the frankincense אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> thereof [it is] an offering made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ
